thread.title: Ranveer Singh, Bipasha Basu, Shahid Kapoor: Here's who made it to Bolly Insta this week - Bollywoodlife.com
thread.title_full: Ranveer Singh, Bipasha Basu, Shahid Kapoor: Here's who made it to Bolly Insta this week - Bollywoodlife.com

author: Snehal Rajani
title: Ranveer Singh, Bipasha Basu, Shahid Kapoor: Here's who made it to Bolly Insta this week - Bollywoodlife.com
text:
Shahid Kapoor and Mira Rajput sport similar hairdos for a lunch date – check out pics 
Last week has been pretty interesting for celebs. From Kajol and Ajay celebrating their wedding anniversary to Karan Singh Grover and Bipasha Basu holidaying in Goa – here’s taking a look at 5 actors who made it to Bolly insta this week. 
Kajol A post shared by Kajol Devgan (@kajol) on Feb 23, 2017 at 8:47pm PST 
Kajol has been away from social media since quite a few days. However, today, on her anniversary, she shared a super cute picture with with hubby Ajay Devgn on her Insta handle, thanking her fans and near and dear ones for the warm wishes. 
Bipasha Basu 
A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Feb 24, 2017 at 2:14am PST 
A post shared by bipashabasusinghgrover (@bipashabasu) on Feb 23, 2017 at 2:19am PST 
Karan Singh Grover had the best birthday ever thanks to Bipasha Basu. They decided to ring in Karan’s 35th birthday in Goa and well, seems like the party isn’t over yet. In a series of photos shared on Insta, Bips gave us an idea of how she rang in Karan’s 35th birthday in the most romantic way possible! Check out their photos right here. 
Shahid Kapoor 
A post shared by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Feb 21, 2017 at 8:59pm PST 
Hot damn! That’s what you are gonna say after seeing this latest pic that Sasha has shared on his Insta handle. The actor has been Rangooning since almost a month now with no time to rest and today, his film has finally hit the movie screens. (ALSO READ: Rangoon movie review: Kangana Ranaut, Shahid Kapoor and Saif Ali Khan’s earnest performances make Vishal Bhardwaj’s film worthy ) 
Ranveer Singh 
A post shared by Ranveer Singh (@ranveersingh) on Feb 20, 2017 at 9:10pm PST 
How many of you have been missing RS on Insta? We definitely have! The actor is prepping up for his character in Padmavati and has decided to stay off social media as much as he can. Last week, however, he treated us with a selfie after voting during the elctions. We miss you, Ranveer! 
Varun Dhawan 
A post shared by Varun Dhawan (@varundvn) on Feb 21, 2017 at 5:01am PST 
Badri Varun and his Dulhania Alia Bhatt are promoting their film Badrinath Ki Dulhania throughout the country. Last week we spotted them twinning in blue and the actor shared a pic on his Insta handle too. How adorable do these two look! 
So that’s all for this week…We will be back next week with your fav celeb’s Insta stories. Till then, stay tuned to BollywoodLife…
